title: Now Is The Time to Build A National Cannabis Brand
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Talking CBD, hemp, cannabinoids in the health and wellness segment with Smoke Wallin, CEO of Vertical Wellness. Many regulatory headwinds, but near-term hemp and CBD saturation will open up and level off. FDA still captive to pharma industry. Bigger opportunity for natural products industry. Essential to know how to operate in a regulated market. Cannabis beverages - bullish over long-term, many impediments short-term. Mutually beneficial consolidation, cannabinoids + athletes and the amazing results of chickens ingesting CBD. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
